## Description {#details}

A class that can track all registers with locations in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf/unwindrow">UnwindRow</a> object.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> locations use a map where the key is the register number and the the value is a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf/unwindlocation">UnwindLocation</a>.

The register maps are put into a class so that all register locations can be copied when parsing the unwind opcodes DW&#95;CFA&#95;remember&#95;state and DW&#95;CFA&#95;restore&#95;state.

Definition at line 182 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugframe-h">DWARFDebugFrame.h</a>.

### dump() {#a9c39cfdfa887c321e9214515c8654867}

<MemberDefinition

Dump all registers + locations that are currently defined in this object.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="OS">the stream to use for output.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="MRI">register information that helps emit register names insteead of raw register numbers.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="IsEH">true if the DWARF Call Frame Information is from .eh&#95;frame instead of from .debug&#95;frame. This is needed for register number conversion because some register numbers differ between the two sections for certain architectures like x86.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
